ComicInfo.Title: 47 Future Sequels to Saved By the Bell - the College Years; Grossanne: The Second Helping; Cracked's Guide to Subspecies of Everday Imbeciles and Idiots; Cracked Rates the New Thrill-Ride Roller Coasters; Sneak Preview of Christmas Toys; Crackedheads!; Lifestyles of the Rich and Violent; When an Owner Sez...; The Pentagon's Latest Weapons; How Clinton's Programs Have Affected Mother Goose; Virtual-Reality Games We Won't Be So Quick to Try; Custom Coffin Catalog; Saturday Morning Commercial Shut-Ups; Ass Ventoro, Pest Detective & On Shaky Ground
